greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: G.f. satisfies: A(x^2) = -4*x + 1/AGM(1, 1 - 8*x/(A(x^2) + 4*x) ).
comment: See A060691 for the expansion of AGM(1,1-8x), where AGM denotes the arithmetic-geometric mean.
formula: G.f.: A(x) = [x/Series_Reversion(x*G(x)^2)]^(1/2) where G(x) = Sum_{n>=0} C(2n,n)^2*x^n = 1/AGM(1, (1-16*x)^(1/2)) = g.f. of A002894.
results.author: _Paul D. Hanna_, Mar 13 2009
